text: ao banda anak del mean chomnue karpit puok mou sh ri kin ku kmean pheap chreah saat te( na chi sa) . hetonih chaur komaoy puokke tow chit mea sche t a l ha r m banteabpi chhnam nih( chhnam ti brabuon hi ch raoh) . brasen bae puok anak baromph khlach kr a l laoh nung aoy puok anak mean ban vinh daoy kdei sabborsa robsa trong brasenbae trong mean chetnea . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha doeng mha ktebandet
